html:
3.12.19  4:31 pm   How often do you travel for work?

      You put yourself under a lot of pressure to finish songs and videos quickly, but it also sounds like you're constantly flying places. Does that travel interfere with your ability to get things done?
3.12.19  4:23 pm   Wait, questions are saying that you accidentally uploaded a video to Youtube?
3.12.19  4:17 pm   what's a nice airport terminal?
3.12.19  3:29 pm   Help am creative

3.12.19  3:27 pm   I know you mentioned previously that the time sig of "might quit" is 12/8 or 4/4, but I wanted to offer my opinion that it could be 3/4 at a fast viennese-waltz-like tempo. there would still be hypermeter stuff involved but if it was notated in 3/4 you wouldn't ever have to change the time signature to account for the extra "beats" thrown in in between verses and such

3.12.19  3:13 pm   Dude wtf how are you such a perfect human being. Like yes I know you have struggles and flaws just like everyone else, and I'm putting you on a pedestal... but from where I'm standing, god damn, bill. god damn
3.12.19  2:54 pm   the drum fills between stanzas in "might quit" are giving me so much life. thanks bill
3.12.19  2:12 pm   hWo to play jzZa?
3.12.19  2:11 pm   Do you think this website is optimised enough to be used on a mobile device?

3.12.19  2:02 pm   how should a child meet with instruments and learn music?

      should it be introduced like a toy and let the kids discover the instruments by themselves

      or train them with teachers?

      the teacher method seems like forcing the kid to learn which makes it not fun, like a homework or something.

3.12.19  1:17 pm   Favorite paul shaffer moment?

this
3.12.19  12:46 pm   But is it really possible?
3.12.19  11:32 am   Loved your drumming on Scary Pockets, did you do anything else in LA?
3.12.19  10:30 am   have you ever played vibraphone
3.12.19  10:09 am   Do you ever plan on collaborating with vulfpeck in the future?
3.12.19  9:57 am   was the title "and the day goes on" inspired by "and the waltz goes on?"

3.12.19  9:43 am   if you only listen to half of most songs you listen to, how do you motivate yourself into making second halves to songs you write?

      Or are all songs you've ever released just half of a longer song?

3.12.19  9:40 am   favorite wings moment?

this

3.12.19  8:45 am   do you have any mental disorders?

      if so what are they?
3.12.19  8:20 am   Are you going to put the new song on the website?

3.12.19  8:12 am   Favourite Beach Boys moment?

this

3.12.19  8:02 am   Favorite Bon Jovi moment? (mine is Richie Sambora's guitar solo in Dry County)

this
3.12.19  6:12 am   do you know when to stop?
3.12.19  5:58 am   Are you happy with how Might Quit came out?

3.12.19  2:47 am   What reality video is everyone referring to?

      The latest one I see in the reality section is from 2016

3.12.19  2:34 am   Was Might Quit an accident release onto YouTube already?

      It was worth the wait!

3.12.19  1:34 am   Why can I only see your reality videos back in 2016.

      Seems many others are facing the same problem.

      Where can I see the new ones
3.12.19  12:56 am   What do you think of Edward Snowden's whistleblowing of confidencial CIA files?

3.12.19  12:46 am   if you've become immensely sick of yourself and desperately dived into collaboration, can we expect to see other artists featured on the bill wurtz channel, are you reaching out to anyone for that purpose?
3.12.19  12:39 am   was 'history of the world, i guess' originally going to be a musical?
3.11.19  11:56 pm   i feel so many things right now, i feel too many things
3.11.19  11:34 pm   How the fuck do you know if the shit you're making is actually good shit or if you're just fucking delusional.
3.11.19  11:30 pm   What makes something acoustic
3.11.19  10:15 pm   Can you physically answer a question seriously? (Sorry if it sounds rude)
3.11.19  10:00 pm   whats the longest question somebody has asked you

3.11.19  9:22 pm   YOOOO that scary pockets arrangement was fuckin fire!!!!! i'll be trying to catch them on tour for sure. do you know which genius was responsible for it (the arrangement not the tour)?

      also, what a brilliant job you did on the drums. so slinky and perfect. i know in the past you've said you 9nly have time to make your own content, etc. so can you tell us a bit abt what motivated you to join forces with the band for that one performance?

3.11.19  8:54 pm   favorite toto moment (the band, not the dog)

this

3.11.19  8:33 pm   What kind of music do you listen to?

      And should I start my sentences when I talk with friends with lowercase or uppercase letters?
3.11.19  8:28 pm   can you be born again? if possible, would you do it in russia?
3.11.19  8:19 pm   bill it's time for real drums in your music

3.11.19  6:33 pm   So here's my problem. I really, really, want to start creating things. I have all the ideas, I have the motivation, but there's just so much I want to do that I can't find where to start.

      I just don't really know how to convert all these ideas into the earthly realm, if that makes any sense. I think it might be a problem with finding the right medium? Pls help
3.11.19  6:28 pm   do you have a certain drum groove you like that you can play all day
3.11.19  5:05 pm   Can we expect more collaborations like the one with scary pockets? Maybe opening up the door for the Bill Wurtz "real" big band?
3.11.19  4:37 pm   bill, when i'm playing a melody on my keyboard that has a lot of big leaps, how do i get to decide on the proper fingering so that my hands don't move awkwardly
3.11.19  4:27 pm   do you have faith in humanity?
3.11.19  4:21 pm   How did you meet/decide to drum for Scary Pockets?
3.11.19  4:14 pm   Why do you love Finder?
3.11.19  3:46 pm   will the new song be on itunes?
3.11.19  2:54 pm   did you have a jam with the scary pockets people before/after you recorded the track?
3.11.19  1:58 pm   do you think it's possible
